document_data.name: Hall of Spurs
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hall of Spurs''' was a room in [[Castle Obarskyr]], [[Suzail]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: After his theft of the ''[[Royal Gorget of Battle]]'', the fugitive mage [[Elminster Aumar]] was pursued by a team, led by the [[War Wizard]] [[Kelgantor]]. Prior to deployment, they were assembled at the Hall of Spurs by order of [[Vainrence]].
